fields.subject: New Travel Request Submitted — #{{ request_id }}
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ approver_name }},

{{ employee_name }} has submitted a new travel request for the following purpose:

{{ purpose }}

Please review and take the necessary action.

Request ID: {{ request_id }}

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Dear {{ approver_name }}, {{ employee_name }} submitted a travel request. Purpose: {{ purpose }}. Request ID: {{ request_id }}.

fields.subject: Your Travel Request #{{ request_id }} Has Been Approved
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

Your travel request has been approved by {{ approver_name }}.

Purpose: {{ purpose }}

Request ID: {{ request_id }}

You may proceed with the next steps.

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Dear {{ employee_name }}, your travel request {{ request_id }} is approved.

fields.subject: Your Travel Request #{{ request_id }} Has Been Rejected
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

Your travel request (ID {{ request_id }}) has been rejected by {{ approver_name }}.

Reason: {{ notes }}

Please contact your approver if you need clarification.

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Dear {{ employee_name }}, your travel request {{ request_id }} is rejected. Notes: {{ notes }}.

fields.subject: Your Travel Booking Is Confirmed — #{{ request_id }}
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

Your travel booking has been successfully confirmed.

Details:

  • Request ID: {{ request_id }}
  • Booking Agent: {{ booking_agent_name }}
  • Ticket / PNR: {{ ticket_number }}

Wish you a safe journey!

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Your travel booking for request {{ request_id }} is confirmed. PNR: {{ ticket_number }}.

fields.subject: Your Travel Booking Was Cancelled — #{{ request_id }}
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

Your travel booking for request {{ request_id }} has been cancelled.

Reason: {{ cancel_reason }}

If this is unexpected, please reach out to your booking agent.

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Your travel booking for request {{ request_id }} was cancelled. Reason: {{ cancel_reason }}.

fields.subject: Reminder: Travel Settlement Pending — #{{ request_id }}
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

This is a reminder to complete the settlement for your travel request {{ request_id }}.

You must complete the settlement before {{ settlement_due_date }}.

Please submit the bills and supporting documents as soon as possible.

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Reminder: Settlement pending for request {{ request_id }}. Due date: {{ settlement_due_date }}.

fields.subject: Settlement Period Expired — #{{ request_id }}
fields.body_html:
Dear {{ employee_name }},

The settlement period for your travel request {{ request_id }} has expired.

Your claim can no longer be submitted unless a valid late submission reason is provided.

Please contact the finance or travel team if you need further assistance.

Thank you,
Travel Management System
fields.body_text: Settlement period expired for request {{ request_id }}.
